EmailTemplate.description: Email to send when Additional Information is submitted for a Case
EmailTemplate.name: Additional Information has been submitted.
EmailTemplate.subject: Additional Information Submitted - {CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We acknowledge receipt of additional information in relation to an application for merit review received by the Merit Review Service on {dateTimeStamp} submitted by {submitterName} ({roleName}).
If you have any queries, please contact mrs@sira.nsw.gov.au or call us on 02 9284 2284.
Yours sincerely
Merit Review Service
